questions.question_text: Dīkṣhā eṭale ________ sankalp, shraddhāe sahit evo achaḷ nishchay, samyak samarpaṇ, prīti-pūrvak niṣhṭhā, vrat ane dṛuḍh āsharo.
questions.explanation: The definition of Diksha includes 'dṛuḍh sankalp' (firm resolve)

questions.question_text: “Jene Bhagwānno ne santno māhātmya-gnāne sahit nishchay hoy tethī Bhagwānne arthe ne santne arthe shu na thāy?
questions.explanation: This quote about serving Bhagwan and the Sant comes from Vachanamrut Loya 3.

questions.question_text: Ā shāstramā Parabrahma Sahajānand Paramātmāe darshāvel āgnā tathā upāsanānī paddhatine ________ rīte jaṇāvī chhe.
questions.explanation: The Satsang Diksha clearly explains the method of upasana.

questions.question_text: “Keṭalāk siddha thāy chhe ne keṭalāk sarvagna thāy chhe ne keṭalāk devatā thāy chhe ityādik anant prakārnī moṭyap pāme chhe tathā param padne pāme chhe e sarve Bhagwānnī upāsanāne baḷe pāme chhe, paṇ upāsanā vinā koī vāt siddha thatī nathī.”
questions.explanation: This quote about upasana comes from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 56.

questions.question_text: ________ to Akṣhardhāmmā jāvu chhe evo ek sankalp rākhavo.
questions.explanation: Swamini Vato: 'Āpaṇe to Akṣhardhāmmā jāvu chhe evo ek sankalp rākhavo.'

questions.question_text: "...jem ā līmbaḍānu vṛukṣh chhe te ek vār jāṇī līdhu chhe, pachhī koī rīte manmā sankalp thato nathī je, ‘Līmbaḍo hashe ke nahī hoy?’ Evī rīte game teno sang thāy ane game tevā shāstra sāmbhaḷe paṇ koī rīte karīne Bhagwānnā swarūpno je nishchay karyo hoy temāthī man ḍag-mage nahī, evo je nirutthānpaṇe Bhagwānno nishchay ene ame tadātmakpaṇu kahīe chhīe."
questions.explanation: This quote about Bhagwan's nishchay comes from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 14.

questions.question_text: “Jem so so shunya sārā kare, paṇ ek na kare jo āgaḷe; Te sarvāḷo shāno melshe, je kare chhe kāḷap kāgaḷe.
Tem ek Harine parhare, biji kare ________ koṭ; Te to māthāfar chāle mārge, jem jem chāle tem khoṭ.
questions.explanation: The kirtan line contains the word 'chaturāyi'
